name: Amazônicos
description: Amazônicos is a isometric game developed during the Global Game Jam 2020,  where you take on the role of the firefighter Mariana, who after receiving the news that the Amazon forest was on fire and in complete danger, races againts the clock runs to save her loved forest. This demo was builded for a descktop version, but the game is still in development and the final version will be for mobile devices.
